text: Scheinfeld is a town in Neustadt (Aisch)-Bad Windsheim, in Bavaria, Germany. It is 14 km northwest of Neustadt (Aisch), and 40 km east of WÃ¼rzburg. Schloss Schwarzenberg is next to the town. The town is home to an Adidas testing factory. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official town website * Website with information on the Lithuanian refugees ==Gallery== Image:schloss_schwarzenberg_franken_1.JPG|Schloss Schwarzenberg near Scheinfeld Image:ScheinfeldStadttor.JPG|Town gate Image:ScheinfeldNordost.JPG|Northern view Category:Neustadt (Aisch)-Bad Windsheim
title: Scheinfeld
